Package org.apache.taverna.wsdl.soap

Contains classes required to invoke an endpoint for a SOAP based web-service described by a WSDL.
These classes are derived heavily from the original parsing classes from the Taverna 1 WSDLBasedProcessor and have been refactored
to remove references to to Taverna 1

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BodyBuilder
    Interface to a class that is responsible for creating the SOAP body elements from the provided inputs for invoking a SOAP based Web-service.
    SOAPResponseParser
    Inteface that defines all parsers responsible for parsing SOAP responses from calling SOAP based webservices.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBodyBuilder  
    AbstractSOAPResponseParser  
    BodyBuilderFactory
    Factory that creates an appropriate BodyBuilder according to the provided WSDLProcessors style and use.
    EncodedBodyBuilder  
    JaxWSInvoker
    JAX-WS based invoker.
    LiteralBodyBuilder
    An implementation of BodyBuilder that supports creating the SOAP body for Webservices based upon a WSDL with Literal style.
    ObjectConverter
    This class replicates the behaviour of data conversion when using DataThingFactory.bake in Taverna 1.
    SOAPResponseEncodedMultiRefParser
    A SOAPResponseParser responsible for responses that are fragmented into seperate referenced blocks of XML - Multiref format.
    SOAPResponseEncodedParser
    SOAPResponseParser responsible for parsing SOAP responses from RPC/encoded based service, but that are not fragmented to multiref documents.
    SOAPResponseLiteralParser
    Responsible for parsing the SOAP response from calling a Literal based service.
    SOAPResponseParserFactory
    A factory class that selects the correct type of SOAPResponseParser according to the service type , the types output of that service, and the response from invoking that service.
    SOAPResponsePrimitiveLiteralParser
    A response parser specifically for literal use services that return primative types.
    SOAPResponsePrimitiveParser
    SOAPResponseParser responsible for parsing soap responses that map to outputs that can be directly represented with Primitive types (i.e.
    WSDLSOAPInvoker
    Invoke SOAP based webservices
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractBodyBuilder.Style  
    AbstractBodyBuilder.Use  
    WSSTokenProfile  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CyclicReferenceException
    Exception thrown when a MultiRef based xml document is found to have cyclic references when transforming into a flat XML document, therefore meaning the xml cannot be transformed.

Package org.apache.taverna.wsdl.soap Description

Contains classes required to invoke an endpoint for a SOAP based web-service described by a WSDL.
These classes are derived heavily from the original parsing classes from the Taverna 1 WSDLBasedProcessor and have been refactored
to remove references to to Taverna 1
